# laravelforge Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    laravelforge = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/madewithlove/laravelforge"
    }
  }
}

provider "laravelforge" {
  token = "API_TOKEN"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String) Laravel Forge API token.
